description: Migrate product dashboard from Angular codebase to Ionic with responsive design and clean code

requirements.title: Responsive Design
requirements.description: The final output should be compatible with all mobile devices, work on desktop browser, mobile browser, and mobile app

requirements.title: Table Properties
requirements.description: Table headers and data should display in single lines without overlap

tasks.title: Analyze Angular Codebase
tasks.description: Analyze Angular codebase in /Users/mvvkiran/Workspace/Angular/ExampleWithFigma to identify product dashboard components
tasks.notes: Found product dashboard components with HTML, CSS, and TypeScript files. Identified table structure and responsive requirements.

tasks.title: Examine Ionic Structure
tasks.description: Examine current Ionic app structure and understand existing architecture
tasks.notes: Examined Ionic project structure, confirmed module-based architecture ready for dashboard integration.

tasks.title: Identify Dashboard Files
tasks.description: Identify all Angular files (CSS, HTML, TypeScript) related to product dashboard
tasks.notes: Identified complete dashboard structure including user profile, navigation, statistics cards, and products table.

tasks.title: Create Ionic Dashboard Structure
tasks.description: Create proper Ionic page/component structure for dashboard migration
tasks.notes: Generated Ionic page structure using ionic generate page command, set up routing module.

tasks.title: Migrate Dashboard Components
tasks.description: Migrate Angular dashboard components to Ionic with clean code and better naming conventions
tasks.notes: Migrated with improved naming: ProductModel interface, monthlyIncome/Sales, initialStock, soldQuantity, proper event handler naming with 'on' prefix.

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Design
tasks.description: Implement responsive design for all mobile devices (REQ-001)
tasks.notes: Implemented responsive breakpoints: 480px, 768px, 1024px, 1200px. Sidebar transforms to horizontal nav on mobile, cards stack appropriately.

tasks.title: Fix Table Layout
tasks.description: Ensure table headers and data display properly in single lines without overlap (REQ-002)
tasks.notes: Applied white-space: nowrap, fixed column widths, overflow handling, horizontal scroll for mobile. Headers and data display in single lines.

tasks.title: Copy Assets and Update Routing
tasks.description: Copy assets from Angular project and update routing configuration
tasks.notes: Copied user-avatar.jpg and dashboard-design.png, updated routing to redirect to product-dashboard by default.

tasks.title: Fix Compilation Error
tasks.description: Fix Angular standalone component compilation error preventing app from running
tasks.notes: Added 'standalone: false' to component decorator to match project configuration. Application now compiles and runs successfully at http://localhost:4200

deliverables.name: Product Dashboard Page
deliverables.description: Complete Ionic page with responsive design and clean code

deliverables.name: Responsive CSS
deliverables.description: Mobile-first responsive design meeting REQ-001 and REQ-002

deliverables.name: TypeScript Component
deliverables.description: Clean TypeScript code with improved naming conventions and ProductModel interface

deliverables.name: HTML Template
deliverables.description: Ionic components implementation of dashboard UI

testing_notes.notes: Tested responsive breakpoints in SCSS, sidebar collapses appropriately on mobile
Table headers and data configured to display in single lines with no overlap using white-space: nowrap and fixed widths
All Ionic components properly implemented: ion-content, ion-card, ion-button, ion-searchbar, etc.

known_issues.description: CSS bundle size exceeds budget (5.54kB vs 4kB limit)
known_issues.impact: Build warning only, does not affect functionality

resolved_issues.impact: Prevented application from compiling and running
resolved_issues.resolution: Added 'standalone: false' to ProductDashboardPage component decorator

next_steps: âœ… Application successfully running at http://localhost:4200
Test dashboard functionality (buttons, table interactions, responsive behavior)
Test on actual mobile devices and different screen sizes
Consider CSS optimization if bundle size is critical
Add unit tests for dashboard components
